data.name: ImmaterialAI Plus
data.detailed_description:
ImmaterialAI Plus expands the praised ImmaterialAI platform with new features like Meta models, Dependency graphs, Task management, Train your intuition, Sanity check, Clusters and more, while upgrading the core ImmaterialAI experience for a better symbiosis between new and existing functionality.

NEW: Return to Bliss Season 2 - unlock exclusive rewards if you finish "Return to Bliss" and have before Jan 1st 2023

Other than the Coming Soon section, all features are already live

Meta models

  • create new dimensions of data
    • node types e.g. Person, Entity, Event, Feeling, Worldview, Belief
    • link types e.g. Parallels, Depends on, Related to
  • update default node and link types
  • ability to constrain link types to specific node types
  • set custom colors and icons to your meta data, visible all throughout the app (in graphs too!)

AI

  • (NEW) Sanity check - calculate the relative and absolute validity of your entire library in less than a second
    • find unknowns, changes, differences between relative and absolute, validity distribution
  • Check for link AI function: input any 2 concepts and the AI will find out if they are linked, directly or n-th degree indirectly
  • Dependency graph: autogenerated dependency graph now available in the AI tab of any node
  • (NEW) Clusters: calculate how your data is clustered based on all your nodes and relations + view clusters as graphs and easily export them
  • Quickly add dependencies and dependents from the AI tab
  • 'Me' page, auto-generated from 'current' and 'old me' links

Train your intuition

  • train your ability to successfully tap into answers/information in rationally impossible ways (impossible within current materialism)
  • 3 difficulties: easy/medium/hard
  • animated charts for statistics:
    • consecutive correct predictions (per difficulty)
    • overall average correct predictions (per difficulty)

To-do system

  • Assign to-do status to any node
  • Standalone auto-generated task board,
  • (NEW) create tasks and nodes on the fly inside the task board
  • Task filter added to the home page

Home page+

  • Query through meta data from the search bar, use "meta" to show all node and link types
  • Query through all tasks from the search bar, type "todo", "inprogress", "done","tasks" and variations to show tasks of different states
  • root filter: show only 'root'. 'parent', 'child' nodes, autogenerated from existing 'parent' links
  • Separate multiple search flters with '|' e.g. todo|favorites|cat:feeling|a
  • Tapping on the category of a node/link type will filter your home page to show only node/link types
  • Tapping on the category of a node (e.g. feeling 'happy') to filter only feelings will now also show up the node type itself
  • new tasks filter on the app bar, combine it with other filters however you want (e.g. show in progress favorites, done focused items, all to-do unprocesses beliefs, etc.)

Customization

  • Quickly add multiple nodes at once
  • Rich text formatting with Markdown in nodes
  • Add links and images to your nodes' contents
  • (NEW) Inline nodes you can expand inside any nodes' content + create them on the fly
  • (NEW) create tables inside descriptions
  • Multiple UI skins
  • Custom backgrounds

3 more features coming soon

data.short_description: ImmaterialAI Plus expands the praised ImmaterialAI platform with new features like Meta models, Dependency graphs, Task management, Train your intuition, Sanity check, Clusters and more, while upgrading the core ImmaterialAI experience for a better symbiosis between new and existing functionality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/ 8/ 10/ 11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works with APUs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
